{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00510v1", "title": "Ireland Topsoil Contamination Analysis: A Clustering Approach", "summary": "This study investigates topsoil contamination in Ireland using geochemical
data from the Tellus Programme, analyzing 4,278 soil samples across 17,983
square kilometer. The research employs CPF clustering with spatial constraints
to classify samples into seven different groups, revealing distinct
contamination patterns.", "main_category": "stat.AP", "categories": "stat.AP", "published": "2025-05-01T13:27:26Z"}
